item.title: Karnaugh Maps
item.description: karnaugh-maps Can be use to work out the Sum Of Products (SOP) form use to simpify the boolean expression of logic gates. Learned from #TuringComplete I used this to create a simple 3 input OR Gate Further Reading / Watching https://www.electronicshub.org/boolean-logic-sop-form-pos-form/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RO5alU6PpSU https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eGNdpwOrsTo
